description:
Verify that a user can select and purge (bulk delete) specific tasks, and that the selected tasks are accurately removed from the task database.

Navigate to the "Purge Tasks" screen in the app.
Review the list of done tasks and not done tasks.
Select one or more tasks by ticking their respective checkboxes.
Click the "PURGE SELECTED" button.
Observe the confirmation message indicating which tasks were purged.
Check the main task list to confirm the selected tasks are no longer present.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to http://localhost:5173/ to load the application.
Navigate within the application to the 'Purge Tasks' screen.
Review the displayed list of tasks, ensuring both done and not done tasks are visible.
Select one or more tasks by ticking their respective checkboxes.
Click the 'PURGE SELECTED' button to initiate bulk deletion of the selected tasks.
Observe the confirmation message that indicates which tasks were purged.
Review the main task list to verify that the selected tasks no longer appear, ensuring they were accurately removed.
Take a screenshot of the final state to document successful task purging.
